# appending(queryItems:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new URL formed by appending a list of query items to the URL.

## Declaration

```swift
func appending(queryItems: [URLQueryItem]) -> URL
```

## Parameters

- **queryItems**: An array of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLQueryItem] instances to append to the URL.

## Adding query items

- **append(queryItems:)**: Appends a list of query items to the URL.
- **URLQueryItem**: A single name-value pair from the query portion of a URL.

items.description: Appends a list of query items to the URL.
items.name: append(queryItems:)

items.description: A single name-value pair from the query portion of a URL.
items.name: URLQueryItem
